text: Hi. I got this error trying to import some wordpress blogs: Your blog file isn’t formatted correctly. More info: Could not extract any blog posts from the import file. Although it's difficult to say exactly what went wrong, here are some hints. It is preferred (but not required) for your posts to use the post_type "post". If using a custom post type, please ensure post items contain the standard elements for: author name (usually "creator"), publish date (usually "post_date" or "publish_date"), post body (usually "content"), publish status (usually "status”)
